alert.note: Alert for McLean (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 1:57PM CST until February 20 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Blowing snow with winds gusting as high as 45 mph this afternoon. Snow and blowing snow Tuesday. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches possible Tuesday. * WHERE...McClean County * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 AM Tuesday to Midnight CST Tuesday Night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread snow and blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility making travel hazardous.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
